summary: The implementation successfully addresses all core requirements. The AustralianVisaCheckPage has been redesigned with the dark navy header, coat of arms logo, navigation links, breadcrumbs, and bright blue content area. The visa check functionality is preserved with proper form inputs, and the design matches the Australian Government style guide. Minor gaps exist in the expandable VEVO section details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Content section includes expandable/collapsible 'Check conditions online (VEVO)' section with dropdown arrow
missing_requirements.reason: While the diff shows isVevoOpen state and Collapsible components are imported, the diff is truncated at 4000 chars and doesn't show the complete implementation of the expandable VEVO section with dropdown arrow behavior. Cannot confirm full compliance without seeing the complete CollapsibleTrigger and CollapsibleContent implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional government color palette variants (govt-blue-dark, govt-blue-light, govt-orange, govt-orange-dark) beyond the base colors mentioned in requirements
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only mentions dark navy blue (#002554) and bright blue (#006CB5). The implementation added govt-blue-dark, govt-blue-light, govt-orange, and govt-orange-dark variants that were not requested.
